rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
Factual description of cases and location. No high-potency language.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports cases among people involved in culling but contains no explicit calming language or cues.
No minimiser or scale contrast found.
The segment states cases were among people, not a negation.
Factual report of case details/location/activity, not capability or preparedness.
